messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] DUmbest thing I had to learn in school was Re: GE...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/19/2004 9:52:01 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I agree. I never did learn it, never had a use for it. Always scored in the 90 to 100% in
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/19/2004 9:52:01 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
nishamartin@... writes:

> SO, what was the dumbest thing you think you had to learn in school?
> For me, I think it was the whole how to diagram all of the parts of
> speech in a sentence.

I agree. I never did learn it, never had a use for it. Always scored in the
90 to 100% in English, Reading comprehension, etc. I can tell you that a
sentence is worded right or wrong, and I can fix it so that its right, but I
couldn't tell you the rules as to why. Must be from extensive reading... :~)

Peace,
Sang


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
